channel.title: Project Xythax | The Ultimate PI
channel.description:
[center] [shadow=blue,left][size=14pt][b]Project Xythax[/b][/size][/shadow] [shadow=blue,left][size=10pt][u][b]The Ultimate Project Insanity Server[/b][/u][/size][/shadow] [hr] Hello there, MoparScape and welcome to my Development Thread. [b]Why are you doing this?[/b] I'm fed up of people criticising the Project Insanity base. This, is why I'm creating this source. Project Insanity obviously has some major flaws, but these can be fixed, there are spoonfed tutorials everywhere on it. So I'm starting off with the original PI base by Sanity and I'm making this into a brilliant source, for all to revel in and use, I [b]will[/b] be releasing this as soon as it's completed. Project Insanity has some good aspects to it, but all over the RSPS world, there are hundreds of tutorials on improving this base, there's absolutely everything, if someone just put their mind to it and followed even 50 of these tutorials they'd have a pretty great base on their hands. I am, however, going to programming a lot of this custom, and not following tutorials. I may follow them for guidance, but 90% of the new code will be written by me, just inspired by tutorials. [hr] [b]Who else is doing this with you?[/b] No-one, this will be a solo project. [hr] [b]What are you starting with and what's your plan?[/b] I'm starting with the original Project Insanity server and client released by Sanity, Sanity is the creator of this base for those of you who do not know.
Here's my current plan: [/center] [b]Start with skilling[/b]
[ul][li]Fletching[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Agility[/li] [li]Thieving[/li] [li]RuneCrafting[/li] [li]Farming[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Herblore[/li] [li]Crafting[/li][/ul]
[center] [b]Work on the content such as:[/b] [/center]
[ul][li]Take away all un-needed coding[/li] [li]Work on the engine, get it running smoother and make the base more stable[/li] [li]Add in a choice of XP Rate on Log In, similar to SoulSplit[/li] [li]Add in a boss handler for easy adding of bosses[/li] [li]Add in instant item appearance in the wilderness[/li] [li]Add in total in-game play time to the quest tab[/li] [li]Load the object spawns from the .cfg file[/li] [li]Add in certain loyalty titles, based on time online[/li] [li]Add all teletabs working[/li] [li]Add in REAL godwars[/li] [li]Boat Sailing[/li] [li]Gnome Gliding[/li] [li]Add in runes required for teleports[/li] [li]Perfect Resting[/li] [li]Achievement and Quest System[/li] [li]Timed mutes and timed bans[/li] [li]Black-Marks[/li] [li]Degrading Amulets of Glories[/li] [li]Add in a Wilderness Warning[/li] [li]Add in the Crystal Key chest[/li] [li]Add in player saving individually instead of the mass save[/li] [li]Add crowns to the Yell command[/li] [li]Fix ALL dupes[/li] [li]Working report abuse[/li] [li]Cow Milking[/li] [li]Flax Picking[/li] [li]Flax spinning[/li] [li]Clipped npc following[/li] [li]Add in christmas crackers[/li] [li]Add in a password recovery system[/li] [li]Add in the 317 log-in interface[/li] [li]Auto donations[/li] [li]Vote4Cash[/li] [li]Points system that works off everything, PK, PvM, Skilling, Voting.[/li] [li]Door handler, single and double[/li] [li]Ladder/stairs handler[/li] [li]Tele and vengence other[/li] [li]Gmaul special attacks on NPCs[/li] [li]Instant Switching[/li] [li]Add in level up animation[/li] [li]Fight caves start after 10 seconds, no relogging.[/li] [li]MultiBarrage on NPC and Players in multi[/li] [li]Fix PM's completely[/li] [li]Fix ClanChat completely[/li][/ul]
[center] [hr] [b]Media:[/b]
Media will come when I have something to post. Development will start a week today, hopefully I'll have a team of developers by then to help me. [/center]
Kind Regards, Ruby.

item.title: Project Xythax | The Ultimate PI
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:5, topic:438604”][quote author=Dj_ link=topic=541313.msg3965353#msg3965353 date=1333661885]
I’m not trying to bring the project down but the title is miss leading for the sheer fact there will never be an “Ultimate PI” because its main stream and over used.
[/quote]
and no tutorials even show how to fix the main flaws in pshit

This is the Server Development section, not the Server Development teams section. You can’t request for a team in this section, this is only to display your project or to show off some kind of server or aspect of your server.[/quote]

In reply to the quote from dj, I’ll say the same to you.
There aren’t any tutorials to show them, no, but once you’ve read through most of the other tutorials even if you’re a beginner at Java, then you begin to get an understanding and you start to screw around with the codes in it, of course, this is only if you wish to actually learn something, you must have a sense of motivation about you to start looking into guides, not just for servers, but for the whole language of java.

As for the development team, I’ll remove that, my bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Xythax | The Ultimate PI
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Dj_:

I’m not trying to bring the project down but the title is miss leading for the sheer fact there will never be an “Ultimate PI” because its main stream and over used.

and no tutorials even show how to fix the main flaws in pshit

This is the Server Development section, not the Server Development teams section. You can’t request for a team in this section, this is only to display your project or to show off some kind of server or aspect of your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Xythax | The Ultimate PI
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Dj_:

I’m not trying to bring the project down but the title is miss leading for the sheer fact there will never be an “Ultimate PI” because its main stream and over used.

Just because it’s over used doesn’t mean it’s not good. PI has some good aspects to it, and if you just put some work into it then you’re a mile ahead of everyone else who uses it. I’m hoping that when I’m done with this it partly makes people realise that it’s not the base, it’s the programmer.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Xythax | The Ultimate PI
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[center]
[shadow=blue,left][size=14pt]Project Xythax[/size][/shadow]
[shadow=blue,left][size=10pt]The Ultimate Project Insanity Server[/size][/shadow]
[hr]
Hello there, MoparScape and welcome to my Development Thread.
Why are you doing this?
I’m fed up of people criticising the Project Insanity base. This, is why I’m creating this source. Project Insanity obviously has some major flaws, but these can be fixed, there are spoonfed tutorials everywhere on it. So I’m starting off with the original PI base by Sanity and I’m making this into a brilliant source, for all to revel in and use, I will be releasing this as soon as it’s completed. Project Insanity has some good aspects to it, but all over the RSPS world, there are hundreds of tutorials on improving this base, there’s absolutely everything, if someone just put their mind to it and followed even 50 of these tutorials they’d have a pretty great base on their hands. I am, however, going to programming a lot of this custom, and not following tutorials. I may follow them for guidance, but 90% of the new code will be written by me, just inspired by tutorials.
[hr]
Who else is doing this with you?
No-one, this will be a solo project.
[hr]
What are you starting with and what’s your plan?
I’m starting with the original Project Insanity server and client released by Sanity, Sanity is the creator of this base for those of you who do not know.

Here’s my current plan:
[/center]
Start with skilling

[ul][li]Fletching[/li]
[li]Mining[/li]
[li]Firemaking[/li]
[li]Smithing[/li]
[li]Fishing[/li]
[li]Cooking[/li]
[li]Woodcutting[/li]
[li]Agility[/li]
[li]Thieving[/li]
[li]RuneCrafting[/li]
[li]Farming[/li]
[li]Slayer[/li]
[li]Herblore[/li]
[li]Crafting[/li][/ul]

[center]
Work on the content such as:
[/center]

[ul][li]Take away all un-needed coding[/li]
[li]Work on the engine, get it running smoother and make the base more stable[/li]
[li]Add in a choice of XP Rate on Log In, similar to SoulSplit[/li]
[li]Add in a boss handler for easy adding of bosses[/li]
[li]Add in instant item appearance in the wilderness[/li]
[li]Add in total in-game play time to the quest tab[/li]
[li]Load the object spawns from the .cfg file[/li]
[li]Add in certain loyalty titles, based on time online[/li]
[li]Add all teletabs working[/li]
[li]Add in REAL godwars[/li]
[li]Boat Sailing[/li]
[li]Gnome Gliding[/li]
[li]Add in runes required for teleports[/li]
[li]Perfect Resting[/li]
[li]Achievement and Quest System[/li]
[li]Timed mutes and timed bans[/li]
[li]Black-Marks[/li]
[li]Degrading Amulets of Glories[/li]
[li]Add in a Wilderness Warning[/li]
[li]Add in the Crystal Key chest[/li]
[li]Add in player saving individually instead of the mass save[/li]
[li]Add crowns to the Yell command[/li]
[li]Fix ALL dupes[/li]
[li]Working report abuse[/li]
[li]Cow Milking[/li]
[li]Flax Picking[/li]
[li]Flax spinning[/li]
[li]Clipped npc following[/li]
[li]Add in christmas crackers[/li]
[li]Add in a password recovery system[/li]
[li]Add in the 317 log-in interface[/li]
[li]Auto donations[/li]
[li]Vote4Cash[/li]
[li]Points system that works off everything, PK, PvM, Skilling, Voting.[/li]
[li]Door handler, single and double[/li]
[li]Ladder/stairs handler[/li]
[li]Tele and vengence other[/li]
[li]Gmaul special attacks on NPCs[/li]
[li]Instant Switching[/li]
[li]Add in level up animation[/li]
[li]Fight caves start after 10 seconds, no relogging.[/li]
[li]MultiBarrage on NPC and Players in multi[/li]
[li]Fix PM’s completely[/li]
[li]Fix ClanChat completely[/li][/ul]

[center]
[hr]
Media:

Media will come when I have something to post. Development will start a week today, hopefully I’ll have a team of developers by then to help me.
[/center]

Kind Regards,
Ruby.

Read full topic
